TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerDataStoredProcedure extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a stored procedure in the data store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure> class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time. These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface. Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure> class represents a single table in the data store. A collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure> objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.StoredProcedures?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the stored procedure.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string owner) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the stored procedure.
The data store owner of the stored procedure.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and owner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection CreateParameters() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of parameters for the stored procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.CreateParameters%2A> method is called the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.Parameters%2A> property is accessed to populate the collection of stored-procedure parameters.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the stored procedure.
Docs.value: The name of the stored procedure.

Docs.summary: Gets the owner of the stored procedure.
Docs.value: The owner of the stored procedure.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of parameters required for a stored procedure.
Docs.value: A collection of parameters for the stored procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.Parameters%2A> property is populated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.CreateParameters%2A> method the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.Parameters%2A> property is accessed.
